mutants.original_line: gray = gray + [x + (1 << i) for x in reversed(gray)]
mutants.mutated_line: gray = gray - [x + (1 << i) for x in reversed(gray)]

mutants.mutated_line: gray = gray * [x + (1 << i) for x in reversed(gray)]

mutants.mutated_line: gray = gray + [x - (1 << i) for x in reversed(gray)]

mutants.mutated_line: gray = gray + [x * (1 << i) for x in reversed(gray)]

mutants.original_line: gray = gray + [x + (1 << i) for x in reversed(gray)]
mutants.mutated_line: gray = gray + [x + (2 << i) for x in reversed(gray)]

mutants.original_line: gray = gray + [x + (1 << i) for x in reversed(gray)]
